typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TCrossReference
source(output(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_description as string,
		grp_key as string,
		grp_description as string,
		top_id as decimal(28,10),
		bua_description as string,
		bus_key as string,
		bua_id as decimal(28,10),
		bua_key as string,
		top_key as string,
		grp_id as decimal(28,10),
		bus_description as string,
		bus_id as decimal(28,10)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AsqlDimBusinessArea
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select MAX(dimension_key) as MaxDimKey from marts.dim_business_area',
	format: 'query') ~> MaxDimensionKey
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 106.0 && TARGET_CODE != 'PI') ~> FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode
FilterCodetypeIDandTargetCode aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE),
	TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> AggregateTargetCode
AggregateTargetCode derive(TOP_KEY = 'ALL',
		TOP_DESCRIPTION = 'All Business Areas',
		GRP_KEY = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'EG', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE)),
		GRP_DESCRIPTION = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'Energy+', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)),
		BUA_KEY = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE),
		BUA_DESCRIPTION = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)) ~> DeriveTopGrpBus
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')), $$ = '')) ~> DeriveTopLevel
DeriveTopLevel aggregate(groupBy(TOP_KEY),
	each(match(name!='TOP_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateTopLevel
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')&&!startsWith(name,'GRP')), $$ = '')) ~> DeriveGrpLevel
DeriveGrpLevel aggregate(groupBy(GRP_KEY),
	each(match(name!='GRP_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateGrpLevel
DeriveTopGrpBus derive(each(match(!startsWith(name,'TOP')&&!startsWith(name,'GRP')&&!startsWith(name,'BUA')), $$ = '')) ~> DeriveBuaLevel
DeriveBuaLevel aggregate(groupBy(BUA_KEY),
	each(match(name!='BUA_KEY'), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateBuaLevel
AggregateTopLevel, AggregateGrpLevel union(byName: true)~> UnionTopAndGrp
UnionTopAndGrp, AggregateBuaLevel union(byName: true)~> UnionGrpAndBua
DeriveTopGrpBus select(mapColumn(
		TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		TOP_KEY,
		TOP_DESCRIPTION,
		GRP_KEY,
		GRP_DESCRIPTION,
		BUA_KEY,
		BUA_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBusLevel
UnionGrpAndBua, SelectBusLevel union(byName: true)~> UnionAllLevels
UnionAllLevels, AsqlDimBusinessArea lookup(UnionAllLevels@TOP_KEY == AsqlDimBusinessArea@top_key
	&& UnionAllLevels@GRP_KEY == AsqlDimBusinessArea@grp_key
	&& UnionAllLevels@BUA_KEY == AsqlDimBusinessArea@bua_key
	&& TARGET_CODE == bus_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupExisting
LookupExisting split(isMatch(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(ExisitingRows, NewRows)
JoinToAddMaxDimensionKey keyGenerate(output(Dimension_Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddDimensionKey
ConditionalSplit@NewRows, MaxDimensionKey join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinToAddMaxDimensionKey
AddDimensionKey derive(dimension_key = AddDimensionKey@Dimension_Key+ toInteger(MaxDimKey)) ~> DeriveNewDimensionKey
DeriveNewDimensionKey derive(top_id = case(bus_key== '' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@BUA_KEY == '' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@GRP_KEY == '' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@TOP_KEY != ''
    ,DeriveNewDimensionKey@dimension_key*-1,toLong(0)
    ),
		grp_id = case(bus_key=='' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@BUA_KEY == '' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@GRP_KEY != '' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@TOP_KEY != ''
    ,DeriveNewDimensionKey@dimension_key*-1,toLong(0)
    ),
		bua_id = case(bus_key=='' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@BUA_KEY!='' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@GRP_KEY != '' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@TOP_KEY != ''
    ,DeriveNewDimensionKey@dimension_key*-1,toLong(0)
    ),
		bus_id = case(bus_key != '' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@BUA_KEY!='' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@GRP_KEY != '' 
    && ConditionalSplit@NewRows@TOP_KEY != ''
    ,DeriveNewDimensionKey@dimension_key,toLong(0)
    )) ~> DeriveLevelID
DeriveLevelID select(mapColumn(
		TOP_KEY = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@TOP_KEY,
		TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		TOP_DESCRIPTION = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@TOP_DESCRIPTION,
		GRP_KEY = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@GRP_KEY,
		GRP_DESCRIPTION = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@GRP_DESCRIPTION,
		BUA_KEY = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@BUA_KEY,
		BUA_DESCRIPTION = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@BUA_DESCRIPTION,
		dimension_key = DeriveNewDimensionKey@dimension_key,
		top_description = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@top_description,
		grp_key = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@grp_key,
		grp_description = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@grp_description,
		top_id,
		bua_description = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@bua_description,
		bus_key,
		bua_id,
		bua_key = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@bua_key,
		top_key = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@top_key,
		grp_id,
		bus_description,
		bus_id,
		Dimension_Key = AddDimensionKey@Dimension_Key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DeriveLevelID filter(top_id != 0) ~> FilterTopLevel
DeriveLevelID filter(grp_id != 0) ~> FilterGrpLevel
DeriveLevelID filter(bua_id != 0) ~> FilterBuaLevel
FilterBuaLevel select(mapColumn(
		BUA_KEY = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@BUA_KEY,
		bua_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBuaOnly
FilterGrpLevel select(mapColumn(
		GRP_KEY = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@GRP_KEY,
		grp_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGrpOnly
FilterTopLevel select(mapColumn(
		TOP_KEY = ConditionalSplit@NewRows@TOP_KEY,
		top_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTopOnly
